snippet: Greek authorities have seized more than half a million illegally made amphetamine pills, their largest haul to date and thought to be destined for the Middle East....

headline.main: Greece Seizes Amphetamines Suspected to Be Destined for Middle East
headline.print_headline: Greece Seizes Amphetamines Suspected to Be Destined for Middle East

lead_paragraph: Greek authorities have seized more than half a million illegally made amphetamine pills, their largest haul to date and thought to be destined for the Middle East.
